content:
Congratulations on your first popular video! 127 views is a great starting point, and with the right hashtags, you can definitely increase your reach. Here are some popular hashtags that might help:

**Art-related hashtags:**

1. **#Art** (1.4B views) - A broad and popular hashtag for all things art.
2. **#Painting** (434.4M views) - Perfect for your timelapse video.
3. **#Artist** (342.9M views) - Great for showcasing your artistic skills.
4. **#Artistic** (233.1M views) - Another broad hashtag for artistic content.
5. **#LandscapePainting** (21.4M views) - Specific to your video's theme.

**TikTok-specific hashtags:**

1. **#TikTokArt** (14.4M views) - A popular hashtag for art-related content on TikTok.
2. **#TikTokCreator** (10.3M views) - Showcases your creativity on the platform.
3. **#TikTokVideos** (7.3M views) - A broad hashtag for all types of TikTok content.

**Additional tips:**

1. **Use a mix of niche and broad hashtags**: Combine specific hashtags like #LandscapePainting with broader ones like #Art to attract both targeted and wider audiences.
2. **Keep your hashtags relevant**: Only use hashtags that are directly related to your content to avoid confusing your audience.
3. **Don't overdo it**: Use 3-5 hashtags per video to avoid looking spammy.
4. **Create a branded hashtag**: Develop a unique hashtag for your own content and encourage your followers to use it when sharing your videos.
5. **Post consistently**: Regularly posting high-quality content will help increase your following and engagement.

Remember, hashtags are just one part of the equation. Focus on creating engaging, high-quality content that resonates with your audience, and don't forget to interact with your followers by responding to comments and using TikTok's Duet feature.

Good luck, and I hope these hashtags help you grow your TikTok presence!
